com.ami.mse.ucms.dms

Class EditDocumetBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ami.mse.ucms.dms.EditDocumetBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named(value="editDocumentBean")
@ViewAccessScoped
public class EditDocumetBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Contains methods that process DocumentInstance. There is a method that is used to edit some of the properties of the existing document. Uses method from JCRDocumentService for saving the edited instance in JackrabbitRepository. There is a method that generate extracted components from the template and show them in to the web page with values that are saved for the document. There is method that extracts the edited values from the generated components and put the in to ConcurrentHashMap that is passed to the document when it is updated.
    Author:
    Tony
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • onEditPageLoad

        public void onEditPageLoad(DocumentInstance docInstance)
        Makes the inputed parameter current document instance. Making request for redirect to edit-document page.
        Parameters:
        docInstance - the document instance that is passed by the button in the view-documents page. It is passed to the current instance that will be processed

      • generateDocumentForEdit

        public void generateDocumentForEdit()
        Generate components to the edit-document page. The components are extracted from the data base. The instance of the document have property that saves the name of the template used for the save. This template is extracted using that name. Extract components for the template using query. Then finds the container in which will be generated the components and start filling it with extracted components, while set their values by extracting them from the current document instance. Sets the components names into session.

      • editDocument

        public String editDocument()
        Edits current instance of DocumentInstance. Sets the edited property values to this instance. Calls method that extracts this values from the generated components in the page. Uses method for update document in JCRDocumentService. Sets success message if the update is successful.
        Returns:
        refresh the current page

      • getDocumentInstance

        public DocumentInstance getDocumentInstance()
        Returns:
        the documentInstance

      • setDocumentInstance

        public void setDocumentInstance(DocumentInstance documentInstance)
        Parameters:
        documentInstance - the documentInstance to set
